> That ce=
rtain is a good timer abstraction & implementation, but it is not
> what we=
 needed.
> We needed the current date & Time, not a timed period.

So somet=
hing like:

interface Clock {
    Date getCurrentDate()
}

?

My point was =
not to say what abstraction needs to be used, but simply
that the use of an=
 abstraction can do double-duty. Both simplifying
code and also providing t=
estability.
